## Importing data (Problem 0)

I am importing data for Problems 1-2.

```{r}

babies_df = 
  read_csv("data/popular_baby_names.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

trash_df = 
  read_excel("data/trash_wheel.xlsx") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

```



## Problem 1

```{r}
trash_df = 
  read_excel("data/trash_wheel.xlsx", 
      sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
      range = "A2:N535",
      col_names = TRUE) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
  round(trash_df$sports_balls, 1)
  
trash_df = drop_na(trash_df) 

skimr::skim(trash_df)

trash_df

```


### Precipitation Data Cleaning

```{r}
precip18_df = 
  read_excel("data/trash_wheel.xlsx", 
      sheet = "2018 Precipitation",
      range = "A2:B14") %>%
  mutate(year=2018)

precip18_df

```


```{r}
precip19_df =

precip19_df
```
